Pre-Game Insights: Australia arguably have more depth and explosive power than New Zealand.
Kane Williamson didn't rule out the possibility of both Ferguson and Milne featuring in New Zealand's XI.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was under cover for most of Friday so Finch only got a brief look at it. He said it was on the drier side.
The SCG recovers quickly from rain, which the Australian Bureau of Meteorology, says is likely to come in the afternoon and the evening.
Others: The boundaries in Australia are bigger than the those in many other parts of the word.
Boult could be New Zealand's best bet to tackle Wade. The left-arm seamer has dismissed Wade three times in 23 balls in T20Is.
